item.title: Proactive vs Reactive Working in Software Development
item.author: Masoud Kalali
item.description: Intro I was a guest at the The Exchange Nordics Podcast recently around this subject and decided to write a bit more detailed blog post with my thourhts more organized. I recommend listening to the podcast as the other guests had views into the subject from different angles which enriches the understanding. What is Reactive and Proactive working? Looking at the Oxford dictionary for the adjectives definition I find the the brief but clear description as follows
